name: Hero vs Badguys
description:
You're the Hero! Take on and defeat waves of Badguys and claim your highest score possible.

Features:
  • Approachable gameplay, but takes time to master 
  • Several strategies to maximize your score
  • Power-ups to help the Hero (You!) out of a bind
  • Special weapons that can be activated to defeat different Badguys in different ways
Controls:
  • W,A,S, and D to control movement
  • Mouse position for targeting
  • Left Mouse Button to fire weapons
  • Right Mouse Button to activate Special Weapons
  • Space Bar to use shield
  • Ecs Key to Pause
Minimum Requirements:
  • Processor speed @ 2.00Ghz
  • 2 GB RAM
  • Harddrive Space @ 80 MB
  • Graphics Card with 2 GB RAM
Feature to Come!
  • More Enemies! making waves even more random and some more challenging. 
  • Better controller support! It is a "TWIN-STICK Shooter" after all...
  • Graphical Improvements! Better lighting, 3D models, more dynamic backgrounds, improved weapon effects, etc...
  • Local and Online Leaderboards! Compete against your friends on your own system arcade machine style, and online against randoms on the web. 
  • Continuous tweaks and balances as the game progresses.
